website_summaries.verdict: The 3D Robotics Solo drone offers aerial tools for cinematographers to get stunning shots with a GoPro action camera, but it's held back by a weak GPS and short battery life.
pros: Capable of smooth, automated gimbal tilt adjustment
Control app works with iOS and Android devices

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Technology
customer_reviews.text: This is actually really amazing technology. Unfortunately it was blown out of the water by DJI when they decided to offer the Mavic Pro Drone. I ended up selling mine for the Mavic. The 3DR had all the same features and was a couple years older. I also liked the open-source nature of the 3DR which allowed it to do some things that the Mavic probably can't. I loved using this drone with my GoPro that I already owned. At the end of the day though, the backpack in which I would carry it was HUGE and that meant I almost never took it with me anywhere. And if that was the case, what is really the point?
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: ... supposed to be followed the instructions and everything went fine took it out side fired up the engines oh ...
customer_reviews.text: I received my Solo it on time opened it and everything was there that was supposed to be followed the instructions and everything went fine took it out side fired up the engines oh yeah this is straight out the box stock it picked up 12 satellites in less than 2mins and was flying with no problems period..... I haven't tried all the functions as of yet will update accordingly till then Thanks
customer_reviews.author: John McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy the 3DR Solo there is no Tech Support
customer_reviews.text: The 3DR Solo Drone had great potential and when it is operable flys beautifully! I have owned the drone for 6 months and 4 of the 6 months the drone was inoperable! Problems occurred with Solo immediately including the IOS system for Solo app update for iPhone streaming video; only one update occurred and IOS updates monthly. I had to purchase an android devise with a Solex app. Worked for a few days and then no streaming video...again. Changed the HDMI cable as indicated in forums.still no video streaming to date! I want to return the 3DR Solo!!! I want my money back!!! How do I return the 3DR Solo???
customer_reviews.author: Lane Mathieson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing drone! for the price is a steal
customer_reviews.text: Amazing drone! for the price is a steal. Buy more propellers as i have already broken 2 out of the six it comes with and you are goping to need replacements as these are going out fast. also but the propeller protections, you'll be gald you di so. already has fallen twice and the most amazing part is that the drone itslef does not have even a scretch. the propellers on the other hand are the first thing to break.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Chacon

customer_reviews.title: Really can shoot great footage and at the lower price it is excellent
customer_reviews.text: Rock stable. No object avoidance so be careful and know how to turn off the propellers in a crash! I think it's hold the a button and the pause button. Really can shoot great footage and at the lower price it is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Thad

customer_reviews.title: Just say NO to Solo
customer_reviews.text: Took 4 calls to Tech Support just to get WiFi connection working and they actually asked me to disconnect internal wiring and disassemble the thing to troubleshoot it. Virtually no consumer-level support for Solo. It looks cool and once I finally got it working, it was OK. But DJI Phantom and GoPro Karma blow it away on user-friendliness.
customer_reviews.author: William Ender

customer_reviews.title: Best drone for the price very smart and helpful for ...
customer_reviews.text: Best drone for the price very smart and helpful for all type of land, structure inspection, you can programed with different Aps like Tower, Solex or 3DR and work excellent better than any of my other Drones.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I bought this for my fiance's birthday ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I bought this for my fiance's birthday and he was like a little kid on Christmas. Most problems we have had have been user error. This was a great buy and worth every penny to see his face light up the way it did!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it it's very amazing Drone
customer_reviews.text: I love it it's very amazing Drone. It's very powerful very good balance you will always record like a pro. the camera go pro 4 with the gimbal will always stay level no matter what it's a great experience evry time I fly it.
customer_reviews.author: Ab

customer_reviews.title: great drone.. dont think just buy it
customer_reviews.text: great drone.. even without support anymore there is more then enough with the last updates to keep this operational for years
customer_reviews.author: john57g

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I knew what I was getting into with the 3DR Solo and saw that this was a great deal. Thought it came with 2 batteries but only one was in the bundle. Plenty of props but most were very unbalanced and mismatched. Will be replacing with MAs.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: 3DR Solo won't connect to controller and won't factory reset
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on 6/11. Shipped on 6/12. Received on 6/13. Right out of the box this 3DR Solo won't connect to controller and the solo app; and won't factory reset either. I fully charged all batteries. YouTube videos show that there are many other poor souls who have experienced this issue. I have spent hours with this effective drone trying to get it to work and this review is where I will stop. I really needed this thing to work and ready for an event on Saturday the 17th. SERIOUSLY!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ja-Storm

customer_reviews.title: I won because this drone usually runs $1000 I bought it under $300 trust me you going to love
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friend he loves it . I won because this drone usually runs $1000 I bought it under $300 trust me you going to love it
customer_reviews.author: Rick Payton

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Drone wouldn't connect with phone or controller. Tried factory reset, and still would not work.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: This looked like a rev B solo
customer_reviews.text: Came as an open box. scuffed up badly--clearly used, missing charger, missing directions, missing strap on box, no labels on motors. This looked like a rev B solo. I ordered 2--the second one was rev A and completely new. Returned this one for an exchange--see what happens?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best drone for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: One of the greatest loves of my life and saddest losses. RIP Solo. One star off because of the software issues I'd face, but all drones seem to have software issues in my experience.

customer_reviews.title: I would like to get this one to work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a year ago. My wife got sick never had a chance to check it out. By the time I could check it was several mins later. I couldn’t get the controller to sink with the drone. I had some younger people try they couldn’t get it to work either. Can I get another controller r replace unit. I bought extra batteries for drone. I would like to get this one to work. Can u help me. Kenfeeler@yahoo.com
customer_reviews.author: K man

customer_reviews.title: Great item better seller
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product great price and it arrived early. It truely is a great drone but the price is right for some squeeze space money for the better gimbal.

customer_reviews.title: Great flyer but limited flight time. well made
customer_reviews.text: Impressive product in many ways but short flying time with gimbal and camera

customer_reviews.text: 3DR solo drone;. would not calibrate out of he box... seller was prompt in helping me with the issue .. new one is great . love the drone
customer_reviews.author: krout

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Thanks DroneFlick!
customer_reviews.text: I had a question when I got the drone and I called the number and got an actual person who answered all my questions and was extremely pleasant. I purchased this drone from droneflick. I'm very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Michael Catroppo

customer_reviews.title: Read all reviews!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this pile of garbage. No need for a lengthy in depth review here. Took it out of the box charged all the batteries until full, powered it on and the remote would not emit a WiFi signal nor would the remote connect to the drone itself. Glad I wasn’t one of the suckers who spent 1200$ on this paper weight. Thoroughly read all reviews and even google some common problems. The drone forums are STUFFED with 3DR problems. This was my first drone and it may have ruined the activity for me forever. Read every review and not just the ones posted by employees of the 3D robotics trying to talk up how awesome this pile is.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: recommended sending to them for a new
customer_reviews.text: Never worked, had to return two days after delivery. Contacted 3dr, recommended sending to them for a new model
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: I'm Loving It!
customer_reviews.text: I love this drone, and if you already have a gopro ++++!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars because I knew what to expect and it's working great now.
customer_reviews.text: I got my solo today, did a few flights, it came refurbished from bestbuy but it shipped from amazon. All there, even had the rev B GPS. I put a 3D printed divider over the GPS and put on the folding legs I printed. Took about 5 minutes to get 12 satilites. I had to go outside, it wouldn't even get one in the building. I hooked etek 4k gopro clone. Had some video problems in solex with my samsung tab 3 but my lg g3 worked perfectly. Had to get the camera recording before take off. Got some good video. The gimbal comes in the mail tomorrow, super excited.
customer_reviews.author: Love FireTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: is what I say 3dr and tradeport on Amazon no real professionalism....
customer_reviews.text: Done malfunctioning my hand could not get to power switch cause of it voilent spin could not set it down and could not turn off with pause putting or sticks .. product malfunctioning no good

customer_reviews.title: Great bird.
customer_reviews.text: Love my SOLO. I wouldn't say it was for beginners. This bird is not cheap. Easy to fly and the things it can do will astonish. I wish it had obstacle avoidance.

customer_reviews.title: SOLO my JO-Y
customer_reviews.text: This drone epitomizes perfection. It is an incredible feeling to fly the Solo and that feeling is not diminished one iota with subsequent flights. The joy of drone flying has been fully realized with my new Solo drone!

customer_reviews.text: I’ve had problems with this drone and there seems to be no one available to help since 2018

customer_reviews.title: ... and getting connected was a little fussy but works fantastic. Very stable flight right on first flight

customer_reviews.text: They were so helpful! They shipped it a week early for me to get here in time for my boyfriends birthday. He loves it! It has so many cool features and is really easy to understand. It is the first drone either of us have used at all and we quickly got the hang of it!

customer_reviews.title: The equipment listed as "new", according to the seller ...
customer_reviews.text: The equipment listed as "new", according to the seller. However it does not work. On first start up, it is giving errors, and will not power on successfully. I can't believe they would sell equipment that does not work.

customer_reviews.title: Everything came in good condition. A socond battery would have been awesome
customer_reviews.text: Everything came in good condition. A socond battery would have been awesome.

customer_reviews.text: The drone itself is ok. And maybe once upon a time it was innovate. That in addition to the fact that they no longer manufacture them really puts buyers into a deadens solution.

customer_reviews.text: The 3DR Solo was not what the recipient wanted. Which was sad because I was going to add the other components for his birthday.

customer_reviews.title: The only good thing about this purchase is Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Many issues with this model. The phone app crashes every time. The drone worked three times, then stuck in calibrating process every time even after reset. The only good thing about this purchase is Amazon.com allowed me to return it for partial refund after three months. I think the main issue here is for about $250, we shouldn't expect high quality.

customer_reviews.title: ... props are not that durable but the drone is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Black props are not that durable but the drone is amazing

customer_reviews.title: Defective. But love amazon easy replacment process.
customer_reviews.text: This product was defective out of the box. It had a magnetic error. Drone would not sync or fly. Sent back in for a replacement. The second one works great. Two stars. Because we have found out this is a very big and wide defect on a lot of these drones. With no recall on them. Quality needs to be way better.
customer_reviews.author: QueenB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Once setup with all the small tweaks this is a movie quality quadrotor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: look it is a great drone. i bought this as a back up
customer_reviews.author: Alastair Rugg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Drone Package for an Awesome Price!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why there are so many negative reviews..Perhaps they are put there by DJI ;). My Solo has been great right out of the box! Software update went smoothly. Flies like a dream, no GPS signal issues at my location. Video footage is awesome, smooth, professional looking in 4K! Flight/video modes are also an awesome added feature. I would recommend this drone to anyone, even beginners with some linux knowledge (the controller and drone both run a linux based OS. terminal knowledge is needed to re-calibrate the controller after a software update.). Make sure to get extra flight batteries, they last around 20 min. each, and take an hour to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: best drone I ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: Got my Solo today ,and i ust say i am more than impressed . I had read may reviewa where people said not to buy one.from all I can tell thereason for this is that 3DR dosent make these any longer well i say for $260 which is what i paid on amazon you can not go wrong .I have paid more for drones with half the capabilities of the Solo .It is awesome flys great no problems so I would whole heartedly say buy one...
customer_reviews.author: bunkerboy

customer_reviews.title: The disappointment was that it looks as though it was used
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely excited to receive this as I have been looking at it for over a year. The disappointment was that it looks as though it was used, the box was taped shut, I could not connect to the controller to setup wifi (thank god for youtube and forums). To top it all off the propellers were all scuffed and looked well used. I love the copter but would like top make everyone aware that the price is great but I paid for a NEW Solo not a returned unit or "refurbished" unit. Flew the copter today and absolutely loved it, just wish it would have been brand new as advertised and promised!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a fantastic "toy"! Easy to set up and fly. I had an issue with the software when I first started it. I called customer support and had it cleared up in 20 minutes. No issues whatsoever. Would highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a drone!
customer_reviews.author: stevev

customer_reviews.title: I sent it back to Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love this drone. I brought it in an important community event for videoing, but it kept saying "waiting for solo" for hours. It's so embarassing. Then i spent another hours to try solving the problem. I did re-pairing, factory resetting and all effort i could find from google. It didn't solve the problem. I started return process right away...
customer_reviews.author: XPR98

customer_reviews.title: Arrived DOA!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well the first one arrived DOA basically. Followed update instructions exactly and it wont pair with the remote. Requesting exchange from amazon, will update once I get my new copy of this.
customer_reviews.author: E. Russo

customer_reviews.title: Solo drone
customer_reviews.text: 3DR Solo is greate drone as expected, the battery dain in 11min but I will replace it. But in general Is excellent and the price was better!
customer_reviews.author: Jose E. Garcia Villamil

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I would have thought it would come with an extra battery because its a good idea to have. The battery doesn't last as long as I would like it to, so I suggest to anyone buying one to buy an extra battery and extra propellers while you are learning to fly it! I only needed to replace them one time, but all in all, this product has great packaging and is worth what you pay!
customer_reviews.author: Mt made

customer_reviews.title: 3dr solo forever
customer_reviews.text: Despite reviews this is by far a great buy and provides exceptional performance for anyone with the aptitude to fly a drone. Most complaints about performance are due to lack of flight experience and lack of controller knowledge.
customer_reviews.author: waldo

customer_reviews.title: Shipped and fast and brand new packaging but looked like it has been sitting on the shelf for years ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipped and fast and brand new packaging but looked like it has been sitting on the shelf for years and the battery was completely defective from sitting too long and completely discharged.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Rahbari

customer_reviews.title: This is an incredible deal. don't waist your money on soon to be obsolete drones.
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolute steal. It has worked perfectly, very easy to fly and being a medical device engineer, the quality is superb. In 6 months all of the existing drones will be obsolete to newer technologies. Why waste a pile of cash for something that will be soon gone, this is an incredible deal. You must download the owner's manual as there is not enough in the package to get everything right. I hope to use this drone for quite a while and at just of $400 you cannot go wrong, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Love to fly this drone
customer_reviews.text: was a great price at 450 ,fly great and for have never taken to the sky's till this drone it was a snap to get up and going ,
customer_reviews.author: zaps40

customer_reviews.title: It's alright.
customer_reviews.text: Visually it has the best visual appearance on the market. It Flys great sometimes. Takes a long time to get gps signal even when in open space no obstructions or extra wireless signals to interfere. Far out in the county on farmland. The gimbal works well sometimes but must make sure the wires are not touching it. There is just too much TLC that you have to do to this drone to get it to work the way it is advertised. It's just not work the trouble in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: JayJay

customer_reviews.title: it has been great.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it doesn't work as expected, I think it has to do with a weak GPS signal. And when the GPS signal goes awry then the drone behaves unexpectedly. Otehrwise, it has been great.
customer_reviews.author: v33j

customer_reviews.title: cant believe how great of a drone this is for the price
customer_reviews.text: cant believe how great of a drone this is for the price! I would have been happy with the product even with the 800 dollar price. its great... the return home button literally landed it within inches of where I took off. very happy with this!

customer_reviews.title: Great package deal price!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not to shabby getting very stable footage on my hero 4 silver great drone camera is completely upgradable 3DR calls it future proof we will see!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drone, especially for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It is great for beginners like me and the settings make it very easy to learn how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Faceoff4

customer_reviews.title: How Is This Different Then 2017 and Aerial Model??
customer_reviews.text: There are three different 3DR drones for sale; I can't tell the difference although they all look the same and seem to have all the same features., their is the 2017 3DR Solo Drone Quadcopter and the 3DR Aerial Drone which all seem to be the same. #DR customer services says they are all three the same. Yet they all three are a different price.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drone

customer_reviews.title: I'm loving it!

customer_reviews.title: Caution

customer_reviews.title: Amazing drone!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first big drone and it hasn't done anything but impress! This thing is absolutely amazing. No problems what so ever and I've flown it a lot now that I've got it. Most of the bad reviews are people that get it thinking it's a toy and don't read the manual or do and crash it on their own. It's very very easy to fly in standard and manual mode . I had a cheaper drone to practice manual on and the solo is like butter. Once I have some spare change I won't hesitate to buy another 1 or 2. Great drone for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani1113

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad. I enjoy it. Paid $260 for it and I suppose that's not too bad for the item. Read reviews talking about how it's notorious for losing gps and that much is very true. Constantly losing gps.

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy. A little difficult to link smart phone ...
customer_reviews.text: Cool toy. A little difficult to link smart phone Go Pro camera and Solo copter but I'm not all that tech smart. Would like to find a "pick up" device and controller so that I can drop water balloons on my grand kids.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mahler

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for a drone, look no further
customer_reviews.text: I love this drone. It has lived up to its expectations. Very happy that I bought the backpack with it as well. Definately the best drone on the market at this time.

customer_reviews.title: Best UAV (drone) under $5000!!! Amazing tech!!! Top shelf!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best UAV I have ever flown! The features and technology intergrated into this UAV is mind blowing! Make sure you get the gimbal for the camera & an extra battery or two & you will be producing footage that will blow your mind... Also the thing is damn fun to just fondly around too!

customer_reviews.title: 3dr solo fell from sky for no reason (ruined)
customer_reviews.text: 3Dr Solo just malfunctioned and fell into the ocean. This malfunction ruined my 500.00 GoPro.3Dr has been less than helpful with this terrible situation. I'm out over $1000.00 and they say "Sorry for your loss"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe at any altitude.
customer_reviews.text: BUGGY! I wanted desperately to like it. But it is unsafe at any altitude. Buggy components. First controller would not reset then drone had magnetic compass interference. Went through two drone sets. Finally got it into air. It hovered then started landing it and it lost control like a wild banshee and crashed. Thankfully no people in way.
customer_reviews.author: Zombienaic

customer_reviews.title: Best Drone By Far,And Super Smart Drone don't listen to everyone before you try it
customer_reviews.text: I just got this Drone a few weeks ago, i Have had the DJI Phantom and trust me the only thing that's different was the Brand Name this Drone is Super smart very reliable and will always have customer support with live OTA Software updates do listen to that fool in the Video cause his not working for the company any more,i have spoken to the guys over at 3D Robotics and they are mad about the reviews and will make a follow up.
customer_reviews.author: Moses Mbaya

customer_reviews.title: Buy a solo!
customer_reviews.text: Get yourself a solo. I love this thing! It flies so much better than some of the others I've flown. Phantoms are pretty steady for the most part, but so is this and it flies much faster when needed. Yuneeks are for the most let pretty smooth, but just fly weird to me. Like it doesn't react fast enough to the accelerometers. Again, the solo is as solid as a rock on the air. Get the gimbal and a GoPro and you've got a very capable and reliable system. I've had a couple of minor issues, but they were rapidly taken care of by 3DR. I've no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Snyder

customer_reviews.title: This drone is junk. It when up into the ...
customer_reviews.text: This drone is junk. It when up into the air then crashed on its own. It is 5 months later and yet 3DR has not given me a responce on if they will cover the damage.
customer_reviews.author: James F. Angus

customer_reviews.title: I would look at other drones first before this one.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bundle. But since 3DR is going under they are no longer supporting the Solo. Because the support has stopped they are not updating the software to keep up with technology. Example: I updated my GoPro Hero 4 black to version 5.0. Now the camera does not turn on when the Solo is powered on. After asking 3DR tech support they said I have to downgrade the software on my GoPro to version 3.0 to get it to work right. I wanted this drone to succeed but the promises they made have fallen short.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Day late $ short.
customer_reviews.text: Mine flys great so far, now I find out that aledgedlly, they are stopping production. I should have waited and saved money or bought another brand. Gimbal only accepts Gopro camera with rear connector. Don't like the way the gimbal mounts or the overly stiff connecting wires and HDMI cable.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd A Prunier

customer_reviews.title: Bs
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!!!!!!!!PLEASE MY SOLO JUST FLIPPED OVER WHILE LANDED THIS IS BS
customer_reviews.author: Stanislav Tordua

customer_reviews.title: This is garbage. Please do not loose your money
customer_reviews.text: This is garbage. Please do not loose your money. Having no sensors is a REAL problem. This drone is gone, sadly,
customer_reviews.author: Nicolás Bera

customer_reviews.title: Just say no!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work out of the box. Had to download some fix that invovled many steps. Chatted with tech support for about an hour. Still doesn't work. 3DR finally said that most of what is sold on Amazon is defective. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sad the company went
customer_reviews.text: Its March of 2017 and I've had no issues but some app crashes which haven't effected flight at all. No problems with GPS connection or crashing. Sad the company went under
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Very Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Drone looks nice and seems to be well built.. But...I set it all up in the house and everything worked fine....took it out for its first flight and drone would not pair with controler...after reading the forums I discovered this seems to be a problem with the 3DR....contacted company they gave me a list of things to do..tried several times with no luck...gave up and returned product for full refund.....very disappointed!! Decided to spend a bit more and ordered the Phantom 4....I set it up and it works perfectly.... I should of orderd the Phantom in the beginning and saved myself the frustration and disappointment.....I would NOT and Can NOT recommend the 3dr after my experience..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its a nice design but i wasn't able to fly
customer_reviews.text: I recieved my drone yesterday and when i went to fly it it would not pair. Its a nice design but i wasn't able to fly it

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but...
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Mine was missing the battery, charger, and props. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: nicksontz

customer_reviews.title: Most Regretted Purchase I've Ever Made
customer_reviews.text: I had a horrible experience with this drone purchase so please read the others, some good some bad?
customer_reviews.author: Richard Tanner

customer_reviews.title: 3DR Solo Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving it. Very sturdy and serious design. The black colour is perfect easy to spot. The fumble works like a charm without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: 3DR Solo Quadcopter (No Gimbal)
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Style:Quadcopter OnlyDesigned from the ground up as a companion to the GoPro HERO, the Solo Quadcopter with Gimbal from 3D Robotics features aerial imaging-specific flight modes including Cablecam mode and Follow Me. A quad-rotor configuration, flight stability and autonomous flying are enabled thanks to a twin computer flight control system. The flight controller relies on GPS for navigational coordinates, plus uses data from gyros, accelerators, and other sensors to keep the aircraft safely flying. The Solo includes the Solo Gimbal, a 3-axis stabilizer compatible with the a GoPro HERO3+ or HERO4 action camera. This is a ready-to-fly bundle, featuring a pre-bound transmitter (radio controller) that has been styled after a video game controller for more intuitive operation. In addition to dual joysticks for flying, it features dedicated dials for operating the Solo Gimbal. In addition to the transmitter, there is a mobile app for iOS and Android devices. The app provides full control over the aircraft, gimbal, and even the GoPro itself. A mount is provided so that you can mount your smartphone directly to the transmitter.
feature_bullets: Solo’s video game-style controller will feel familiar the second you pick it up, even if you’ve never flown a drone. Pushbutton commands put both camera and copter at your fingertips. Take off, land or instantly pause your flight midair with a single touch. Click to start and stop recording or snap a photo, even adjust camera angle while you fly
In case you missed it in the picture…that’s a high-quality HDMI port directly from the controller so you can connect Solo to practically any screen you can think of. Refer user manual below
Full-featured app for iOS and Android puts total craft control at your fingertips.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars397 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
